message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $11,000.
I appreciate your offer, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I really like the product, but I'm trying to stay within a tight budget. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand you're on a budget, Bob, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we split the difference and settle at $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but $10,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,000, but that's as high as I can go. Can you meet me at $10,000?
